about.heading: About Our Agency
about.text: TBME Labs is a web design & development start-up run by two computer science students who really like creating stuff. We are constantly educating ourself to be able to work with the newest technologies on the market. Since we are still students we can offer state of the art products for very attractive prices.

offers.heading: State Of The Art
offers.text: The websites are created with state of the art technologies.

offers.heading: All In One
offers.text: Design, development, hosting and support: We offer all in one.

offers.heading: Maintenance
offers.text: We offer to update and maintain your website.

offers.heading: Built With Love
offers.text: All our websites are unique and adapted to the wishes of the clients.

openSourceProjects.heading: Our open-sourced projects can be found on GitHub!
